If You have any query then Call on Number given below
9067569965
Otherwise message or Contact on Following Social Media
This room contain only one student. 1 year fee is Rs.2,10,000
This room contain only Two student. 1 year fee is Rs.1,80,000
This room contain only Three student. 1 year fee is Rs.1,60,000

The students get an option to choose between a twin sharing room and a triple sharing room. The rooms have unlimited high speed WiFI and house-keeping facilities. To ensure the safety of our students, the hostels have full-time wardens, CCTV monitoring and biometric enabled entrances. The hostels have an inbuilt gym, gaming area, hangout zones reading rooms. The University also provides transport facilities to its students residing in its hostels. The hostel kitchens serve healthy, delicious, and hygeinic food. The hostels administration also organizes celebrations of various festivals like Diwali, Holi, Eid, Dandia, Lohri etc.
More Information Visit On following Social PlatForm
